title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal valuable secrets.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman battles the Joker, who brings chaos to Gotham.

title: Interstellar
overview: Astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home.

title: Titanic
overview: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The Avengers unite to undo Thanos' devastating snap.

title: Shutter Island
overview: A detective investigates mysterious disappearances at a psychiatric facility.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household with unforeseen consequences.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers that reality is a simulated illusion controlled by AI.

title: Gladiator
overview: A betrayed Roman general fights as a gladiator for vengeance.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: A kind-hearted man with a low IQ experiences extraordinary historical events.
